Translations.Text: This est revelation scripture DI Almighty des Sagx
Ni send vi this scripture truthfully; vi worship DI devoting your religi Him sol

Absolutely religi est devoted al DI sol! Those set idols Him dir Ni idolize them nur bring us closer DI; ili est put pozici! DI testament jugx them regarding their disput! DI NE DIREKT such liars disbelievers
Di wanted hav fil Li chosen whomever Li willed el His creations. Li glor; Li est DI 1 Supreme
Li kre heavens ter truthfully. Li volv nokt tag bulk tag nokt. Li committed sun lun each kur por finite period. Absolutely Li est Almighty des Forgiving

Li kre vi 1 ul tiam kre him his mate Li send vi 8 kinds livestock. Li kre vi your mothers' bellies creation creation en trimesters darkness! Such est DI your Lord Al Him aparten all sovereignty! tie ne est ali di Him. Kiel vi deviate

Vi disbelieve DI ne bezon anyone. Li dislikes seg His servants far wrong decision! Vi decid est appreciative Li placx vi. Ne anim bor pek any ali anim. Ultimately al your Lord est your return tiam Li inform vi de cxio vi done Li est fully aware da innermost thoughts

When human est aflikt li implores his Lord sincerely devoted al Him! as baldaux as Li ben him li forges his previous imploring sets idols rang DI divert others His path! dir Gxu your disbelief temporarily; vi incurred hellfire
Gxi est put al 1 de those medit nokt prostrating rest aware da Hereafter est streb mercy their Lord Dir Est those kon egal al those ne kon? Nur those posed intelligence pren heed
dir O My servants kred vi reverence your Lord those worked righteousness en this mond bon rekompenc. Di ter est spacious those steadfastly persevere ricev their recompense generously lim
dir mi komand worship DI devoting religi absolutely Him sol
Mi komand est utmost submitter
dir mi tim se mi disobeyed my Lord retribution de great tag
Dir DI est nur Unu mi worship devoting my religi absolutely Him sol
Do worship whatever vi wish Him. Dir efektiv losers est those perd their anim their famili Tag Resurrection. Plej certainly this est efektiv loss
Ili hav mes de fajr them sub them. DI DO VIGL His servants O My servants VI reverence Me
As por those discard worship all idols devote totally DI sol ili ind happiness. Don bon news My servants
Ili est unu ekzamen all vort tiam sekv des put! These est unu whom DI direkt; these est unu posed intelligence
Kun regard al those ind retribution hav vi sav those can est jam Infer
As por those reverence their Lord ili hav mansions mansions konstru por them kun flu streams This est di promes DI neniam romp His promes

Vi ne seg DI send down cxiel akv tiam ej gxi into underground nu tiam produkt gxi plant Do de various kolor tiam ili kresk gxis ili torn flav tiam Li torn them fojn? This est reminder those posed intelligence
Se DI renders 1 kor kontent Submission li sekv light el his Lord Do ve those kor hard di message ili ir far astray

(DI revealed herein PUT Hadith; LIBR est consistent pint AMBAUX VOJ Heaven INFER)! Hauxt de those reverence their Lord cringe therefrom tiam their hauxt their kor soften up di message Such est di guidance; Li bestows gxi upon whoever vol direkt). As por those send astray DI nothing direkt them
Ki put than sav unu est vizagx terrible retribution Tag Resurrection? transgressors told Gust consequences ki vi earned
Others them disbelieved consequently retribution aflikt them whence ili neniam expected
DI KONDAMN them humiliation en this life retribution Hereafter est far mav ILI NUR KON
Ni cited popol cxiu kind da ekzempl en this Quran ke ili pren heed
Arabic Quran any ambiguity ili est righteous
DI cites EKZEMPL HOM deals kun DISPUT partners (Hadith) KOMPAR al a hom who deals kun NUR UNU consistent source (Quran)! Est ili des sam Lauxd est al DI; plej de them ne kon
Vi (Muhammad) surely mort just like ili mort
Tag Resurrection antaux your Lord vi popol feud 1 another
Who evil than unu atribu est mensog DI while disbelieving en truth ven him? est Infer ne just requital disbelievers
As por those promote truth kred therein ili est des righteous
Ili get cxio ili wish their Lord Such est rekompenc por des righteous
DI remits their sinful works REKOMPENC them generously POR their BON works
est DI ne sufficient His servant? Ili frighten vi idols ili set Him. Whomever DI send astray nothing direkt him
whomever DI direkt nothing send him astray! est DI ne Almighty Avenger

Vi pet them Who kre heavens ter? ili dir DI. Dir tiam do vi set idols DI? Se DI willed any adversity me ili relieve such adversity? Kaj se Li willed ben por me can ili prevent such ben Dir DI est sufficient me Him trusters fid
dir O my popol do your put mi do my put; vi do gxi surely trov out
(Vi do gxi trov out) who incurred shameful punishment ind etern retribution
Ni revealed scripture vi por popol truthfully. Tiam whoever direkt direkt his own bon whoever ir astray ir astray his own detriment! Vi ne est their advokat

DI puts ANIM death when end DE their life ven ANKAUX je des temp da DORM. Tiel Li sorb kelk their dorm while others allowed ad viv end de their predetermined interim This proviz lecion popol who reflect
Ili invent intercessors mediate them DI? Dir Ki se ili ne posed any potenc nor kompren
Dir All intercession aparten al DI. Him aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter tiam al Him vi returned
When DI SOL menci kor de those ne kred en Hereafter sxrump aversion. when others menci Him ili igx sat
Proklam Our di Initiator de heavens ter Knower de all sekret declarations Vi est des nur Unu jugx Your servants their disput
those transgressed owned cxio ter eben twice as mult ili readily don gxi evit terrible retribution Tag Resurrection. Ili montr DI ki ili neniam expected
sinful works ili earned montr them tre ajx ili uz mok vol ven haunt them
Se human tusx adversity li implores us as baldaux as ni bestow ben him li dir mi ating this my cleverness! Ja this est nur test plej de them ne kon
Those antaux them uttered sam ajx their earnings ne help them en des malplej
Ili sufer consequences their evil works Similarly transgressors prezent generaci sufer consequences their evil works ili ne escape
Ili ne realize DI est Unu Do increases provision whomever Li chooses withholds? These est lecion popol kred
Proklam O My servants exceeded lim neniam despair de di mercy! Por DI forgives all pek! Li est Forgiver Merciful
Vi obe your Lord submit Him totally retribution overtakes vi; tiam vi ne help
Sekv put path ke pint vi your Lord retribution overtakes vi suddenly when vi malpli expect gxi
Lest anim dir Kiel sorry mi est disregarding di commandments; mi est certainly 1 de mockers
Dir Hav DI direkt me mi est kun des righteous
Aux dir when gxi seg retribution mi get another sxanc mi work righteousness
jes ja (vi did get suficx sxanc)! My proofs ven vi vi rejected them torn arrogant igx disbeliever
Tag Resurrection vi seg vizagx de those who lied DI kovr kun mizer. est Infer ne dekstr retribution por arrogant unu
DI testament sav those argument righteousness; Li rekompenc them. Ne harm tusx them nor vol ili hav any grief
DI est Creator all AJX LI est en PLEN control all AJX
Al Him aparten all decisions heavens ter those disbelieve di revelations est efektiv losers
Dir gxi ali than DI vi exhort me Est worship O vi ignorant unu
Gxi revealed vi kaj those antaux vi ke vi ever commit idol worship all your works nullified vi est losers
Do vi worship DI sol est appreciative
Ili neniam fathom greatness DI. whole ter est His pugn Tag Resurrection. En fakt, univers fald His dekstr man. Li glor; Li est mult tro alt super bezon any partners
Korn blov whereupon everyone heavens ter strik unconscious escept those sxpar DI! Tiam gxi blov re whereupon ili testament all roz up rigard
Tiam ter lum light its Lord record proklam prophets witnesses brought for! Everyone tiam jugx equitably malplej injustice
Cxiu anim est pag por whatever gxi did Li est fully aware da cxio ili done

Those disbelieved est konduk al Infer en throngs When ili get gxi its gates opened its gard dir Did vi ne ricev messengers el vi recited al vi revelations your Lord avert vi meeting this tag? Ili respond Jes ja! Vort ‘retribution' jam stamp disbelievers
Gxi dir Enter gates Infer wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por des arrogant
Those reverenced their Lord est konduk al Paradise en throngs When ili get gxi its gates opened its gard dir Pac est vi; vi won Do vi abide herein forever
Ili dir Lauxd est al DI fulfilled His promes us far us hered ter gxu Paradise as ni placx. Ki bel recompense workers
Vi seg angxel floating around tron glor lauxd their Lord Post equitable judgment issued al all gxi proklam Lauxd est DI Lord univers
